original_text: But when you ask, you must believe and not doubt, because the one who doubts is like a wave of the sea, blown and tossed by the wind.
korean_text: 오직 믿음으로 구하고 조금도 의심하지 말라 의심하는 자는 마치 바람에 밀려 요동하는 바다 물결 같으니

sentences.original_text: you must believe and not doubt
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 믿어야 하며 의심해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: is like a wave of the sea
blown and tossed by the wind
